name: Hair Bows
description:
HAIRBOWS are back by popular demand! They are very cute & stylish for any cute outfit for people who dab around with different fashions everyday. It was handsewn by the creator to prevent from falling apart or coming undone in those tough fashion change situations, along with a sturdy clip that clings onto your hair but feels as if nothing’s there, so it won’t pull your hair. Lovely, cute hair bows at a low price. Choose From The Following Prints: (Constantly Updated…) Purple H&M Print White 80s Dot Print Brown Leopard Print Green Leopard Print Grey Snake Print Bright Blue Flower Print Bright Rainbow Print Purple Polka Dot Print Tiger Print Purple Frog Print Baby Pink Disney Princess Print (Licensed) Baby Blue Bandana Print Orange Bandana Print Yellow Cat print Pink Flannel Kitten Print Plain Yellow (buttons attached for free upon request) Plain Blue (buttons attached for free upon request) Red Polka Dot (mini-size) Bright Star Print Baby Blue and Yellow Bear Hot Pink Pink Star Print Bright Blue Paisley Print Blue Delicate Flower Print White Button Print Bright Blue Bambi Print (Lisenced) Baby Blue Crinoline Purple Crinoline Note: Photos May Be of Sold-Out Prints
  • If there is another Print that you have in mind, let us know and we will do our best to find it for you *
Custom Order Bows: (2-5 Business Day Wait, depending on Waiting List and Availability) Fuzzy Zebra Print Red Bandana Print Yellow Bandana Print Pink Leopard Print Mixed Media Plastic Bows (contact me for info) Strawberry Shortcake Print Black Music Note Print White Music Note Print Any Colour Crinoline Bows Mixed-Color Crinoline Bows Cyberlox Bow (soon to be back!) Silk Bows Black Lace Bows White Lace Bows Dinosaur Bows Bob The Builder Bows Dora The Explorer Bows 80s Disco Bows (all colors) Neon Bows (all colors) All bows are securely attached to a metal clip. Bobby Pins Can be attached Upon Request.

name: Surprise Bags
description: This is my favourite thing to sell! I will randomly pick out some of my Inventory Items for you based on your Size and Style. You will either get: 1. A Skirt, and Shirt 2. A sweater with matching Accessories and Hair Bow 3. A Purse with Accessories 4. A Shirt With Arm Warmers or Leg warmers and Accessories 5. A Purse and a Shirt 6. A Dress with Matching Leg Warmers All I need to know is your style and your size… NOTE: DIY may not have everything hand-made if Inventory does not permit.
